name: Mount & Blade II Game Data Archive
summary: A TPAC file is a game data archive used by TaleWorlds Entertainment Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord. It contains a 3D model, textures, and materials used to show an in-game character or item. TPAC files can be opened in TpacTool, a third-party TPAC file explorer.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
